---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add addresses to a webhook"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/webhook/add-addresses"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Associate new addresses with an existing webhook to listen for their events.
